evidence_in_dialogue: [[Laurel_Trent]] She grabs the steering wheel and screams
[[Robbins]] if you're close enough to stun him, you're close enough to shoot him
[[Brass]] you know what that means : hit-for-hire
[[Brass]] you know what that means : hit-for-hire
[[Grissom]] your hatred of trent was stronger than your love for your own child
